headline: ExxonMobil Recommends Shareholders Reject Below-Market Mini-Tender Offer by TRC Capital Investment Corporation
summary: SPRING, Texas, June 19, 2025--Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE:XOM) has received notice of an unsolicited mini-tender offer by TRC Capital Investment Corporation to purchase up to 1 million shares of ExxonMobil common stock, which represents approximately 0.023 percent of the shares outstanding as of the June 9, 2025 offer date.
